SENT.plain: A methods for chromosome analysis of malignant cells by means of fine needle aspiration biopsy has been developed
The method has some obvious advantages compared to conventional surgical biopsy
During a 1-year period 25 consecutive non-Hodgkin, non-Burkitt lymphoma biopsies from 19 patients have been studied
In 14 out of 21 lymph node biopsies chromosome analysis was successful; whereas, four biopsies of subcutaneous lymphomas were unsuccessful
